obfuscation: Oh , philosophers may sing , etc .
original: Oh, philosophers may sing, etc.

obfuscation: Yes , it really is a very pleasant existence .
original: Yes, it really is a very pleasant existence.

obfuscation: They're all thus singularly kind and considerate .
original:
They're
  all so singularly kind and considerate.

obfuscation: You do n't find them wanting to do this , or wanting to do that , or saying `` It 's my turn now . ''
original:
You don't find them
  wanting to do this, or wanting to do that, or saying "It's my
  turn now."

obfuscation: No , they let us have all the fun to ourselves , and never seem to grudge it .
original:
No, they let us have all the fun to ourselves, and
  never seem to grudge it.

obfuscation: It makes one feel quite selfish .
original: It makes one feel quite selfish.

obfuscation: It almost seems like taking advantage of their full nature .
original:
It almost seems like
  taking advantage of their good nature.

obfuscation: How nice they were about the double rations .
original: How nice they were about the double rations.

obfuscation: Most considerate .
original: Most considerate.

obfuscation: Ah !
original: Ah!

obfuscation: there 's only one thing wanting to make us thoroughly comfortable .
original: there's only one thing wanting to make us thoroughly comfortable.

obfuscation: And that is ?
original: And that is?

obfuscation: The dear little wives we left behind us three months ago .
original: The dear little wives we left behind us three months  ago.

obfuscation: Yes , it is dull without female society .
original: Yes, it is dull without female society.

obfuscation: We can do without everything else , but we ca n't do without that .
original:
We can do
  without everything else, but we can't do without that.

obfuscation: And if we have that in perfection , we have everything .
original: And if we have that in perfection, we have everything.

obfuscation: There is only one recipe for perfect happiness .
original: There is only one recipe for perfect happiness.

obfuscation: Take a pair of sparkling eyes , Hidden , always and anon , In a merciful eclipse -- Do not heed their mild surprise -- Having passed the Rubicon , Take a pair of rosy lips ; Take a figure trimly planned -- Such as admiration whets -- ( Be particular in this ) ; Take a tender little hand , Fringed with dainty fingerettes , Press it -- in parenthesis ; -- Ah !
original:
Take a pair of sparkling eyes,
                      Hidden, ever and anon,
                           In a merciful eclipse--
                 Do not heed their mild surprise--
                      Having passed the Rubicon,
                           Take a pair of rosy lips;
                 Take a figure trimly planned--
                      Such as admiration whets--
                           (Be particular in this);
                 Take a tender little hand,
                      Fringed with dainty fingerettes,
                           Press it--in parenthesis;--
                 Ah!

obfuscation: Take all these , you lucky man -- Take and keep them , if you can !
original:
Take all these, you lucky man--
                 Take and keep them, if you can!

obfuscation: Take a pretty little cot -- Quite a miniature affair -- Hung about with trellised vine , Furnish it upon the spot With the treasures rich and rare I 've endeavoured to define .
original:
Take a pretty little cot--
                      Quite a miniature affair--
                           Hung about with trellised vine,
                 Furnish it upon the spot
                      With the treasures rich and rare
                           I've endeavoured to define.

obfuscation: Live to love and love to live -- You will ripen at your ease , Growing on the sunny side -- You 're a dainty man to please If you are not satisfied .
original:
Live to love and love to live--
                      You will ripen at your ease,
                           Growing on the sunny side--
      You're a dainty man to please
                           If you are not satisfied.

obfuscation: Ah !
original: Ah!

obfuscation: Take my counsel , happy man ; Act upon it , if you can !
original:
Take my counsel, happy man;
                 Act upon it, if you can!

obfuscation: Here we are , at the risk of our lives , From ever so far , and we 've brought your wives -- And to that end we 've crossed the main , And make n't intend to return again !
original:
Here we are, at the risk of our lives,
            From ever so far, and we've brought your wives--
            And to that end we've crossed the main,
            And don't intend to return again!
